reviewText: Seller sent it super fast before xmas dad loved it and will enjoy for many years to come
A fun tv special featuring my favorite entertainer Liberace!
Love this... had on VHS tape and now easier to use.
I liked this, but could have done without the guest stars Sandy Duncan and Lola Falana. It was an interesting peek inside Liberace's Las Vegas home.
Liberace at the top of his game.  Sandy Duncan and Lola Falana are pretty talented too.  You won't be disappointed if you are a Liberace fan or if you just want some "feel good" entertainment.

This colorful movie of apparently a Special for TV is a very good example of Mr. Showmanship.  This DVD must have been made for sale in Las Vegas after his Special.  It is a good example of how Liberace worked the audiences--the ladies loved him and he flirted and was so easy and happy with his conversations with his crowd.  The conversations seem  unrehearsed and his topics were off the top of his head.  He just visited naturally with his fans who attended his performances.

His arrival at his Las Vegas shows were always grand and in this video he arrives by balloon--all so easily.  Then, the show jumps to the Queen Mary Ship.  There on the ship he entertains with music and dancing and even sitting down to a meal.  It is all so grand.  The movie just shows how elaborate Liberace's productions were.

This was DVD is very colorful and entertaining.  However, I prefer to watch his black and white old TV shows.  His musicianship is so well shown and delivered in his TV appearance's that I prefer the old Black and Whites.
for the price you can not beat it so get you're item to day i love it alot & so dose my mom
Very cute movie.  It show Liberace at his best. He goes blind and learns to lib read and now can see that people need help.  He uses his money to help people with different types of problems.
